mapper.select: select mov_no, mov_title, mov_grade, mov_genre, mov_runtime, mov_director, mov_actor, mov_detail, mov_opendate, mov_enddate, mov_avgstar, mov_poster, mov_video from movie order by mov_no desc

select m.mov_no, m.mov_title, m.mov_grade, m.mov_genre, m.mov_runtime, m.mov_director, m.mov_actor, m.mov_detail, m.mov_opendate, m.mov_enddate, mov_avgstar, m.mov_poster, m.mov_video from comment c right join movie m on c.mov_no = m.mov_no where m.mov_opendate <= now() and m.mov_enddate > date_add(now(), interval -1 day) group by m.mov_no order by m.mov_avgstar desc, m.mov_no desc

select m.mov_no, m.mov_title, m.mov_grade, m.mov_genre, m.mov_runtime, m.mov_director, m.mov_actor, m.mov_detail, m.mov_opendate, m.mov_enddate, mov_avgstar, m.mov_poster, m.mov_video from comment c right join movie m on c.mov_no = m.mov_no where m.mov_opendate > now() group by m.mov_no

select m.mov_no, m.mov_title, m.mov_grade, m.mov_genre, m.mov_runtime, m.mov_director, m.mov_actor, m.mov_detail, m.mov_opendate, m.mov_enddate, mov_avgstar, m.mov_poster, m.mov_video from comment c right join movie m on c.mov_no = m.mov_no where m.mov_opendate <= now() and m.mov_enddate > date_add(now(), interval -1 day) and mov_title like concat('%', #{movTitle}, '%') group by m.mov_no order by m.mov_avgstar desc, m.mov_no desc

select mov_no, mov_title, mov_grade, mov_genre, mov_runtime, mov_director, mov_actor, mov_detail, mov_opendate, mov_enddate, mov_avgstar, mov_poster, mov_video from movie where mov_enddate > date_add(now(), interval -1 day)

select mov_no, mov_title, mov_grade, mov_genre, mov_runtime, mov_director, mov_actor, mov_detail, mov_opendate, mov_enddate, mov_avgstar, mov_poster, mov_video from movie where mov_opendate <= now() and mov_enddate > date_add(now(), interval -1 day) order by mov_avgstar desc, mov_no desc limit 3
mapper.insert:
insert into movie values (null, #{movTitle}, #{movGrade}, #{movGenre}, #{movRuntime}, #{movDirector}, #{movActor}, #{movDetail}, #{movOpendate}, #{movEnddate}, #{movAvgstar}, #{movPoster}, #{movVideo})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update movie set mov_avgstar = (select * from (select ifnull(round(avg(com_star), 1), 0) from comment c join movie m on c.mov_no = m.mov_no where m.mov_no = #{movNo})as mov_avgstar) where mov_no = #{movNo}
